display_long_description:
As you explore this magical realm, you will encounter multiple enemy races and uncover the story. Throughout your journey, you’ll strengthen your army with the gold you earn and develop unique strategies for each enemy.

Unlock a vast array of character, spell, defense, and production cards using your earnings.

Plan your strategy based on your characters’ physical defense, magic resistance, physical attack, magic attack, critical chance, and special abilities.

Conquer the enemy castle before yours falls.

With prolonged battles, expect hours of gameplay!


[media]
Follow your story

[media]
Adjust your card deck as you wish.

[media]
Adjust your strategy based on your enemy's cards.

[media]
WAR!
